name: Dance Workshop: Hip-hop Basics
description: Join us for an energetic and fun-filled hip-hop dance workshop where you'll learn the basics of hip-hop dance moves.

name: Salsa Night Extravaganza
description: Experience a lively night of salsa dancing with live music and professional salsa dancers to guide you through the rhythm.

name: Ballroom Dance Masterclass
description: Learn the grace and elegance of ballroom dancing in this comprehensive masterclass led by renowned ballroom dance instructors.
